00000000 00000000 //NOP
00000001 18010004 //ADDI $1, $0, 4
00000002 1C640000 // LW $4, 0($3)
00000003 00000000 //NOP
00000004 00000000 //NOP
00000005 18840005 // ADDI $4, $4,5
00000006 00000000 //NOP
00000007 00000000 //NOP
00000008 20640000 // SW $4, 0($3)    Write to 0+$3, will not affect $3
00000009 18630001 // ADDI $3, $3,1   Read $3 - RAR, not RAW
0000000a 18A50001 // ADDI $5, $5, 1
0000000b 00000000 //NOP
0000000c 00000000 //NOP
0000000d 24250003// BEQ $1, $5, exit
0000000e 00000000 //NOP
0000000f 00000000 //NOP
00000010 28000002 // J 2
00000011 00000000 //NOP
00000012 00000000 // NOP or Exit
